name: Death's Garden
description:
Made for the Duality Tilemap Jam (but too late)

You are The Grim Reaper. You farm cute bunnies' soul to get seeds to grow your flower farm to get more time to farm more bunnies to farm flowers to...

Sources available here : https://github.com/ChatPion/DeathGarden

How to play : WASD + Left click

Credits :
- Tilesets by a great friend
- Music : Tchaikovsky - Waltz of the Flowers
